thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Advanced Proteome Therapeutics And Immunobiochem Enter Into Collaboration And Option Agreement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Advanced Proteome Therapeutics And Immunobiochem Enter Into Collaboration And Option Agreement
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Advanced Proteome Therapeutics Corp :
* ADVANCED PROTEOME THERAPEUTICS AND IMMUNOBIOCHEM CORPORATION ENTER INTO A COLLABORATION AND OPTION AGREEMENT
* ADVANCED PROTEOME THERAPEUTICS - CO, IMMUNOBIOCHEM ENTER INTO COLLABORATION AND OPTION AGREEMENT TO DEVELOP SUPERIOR ANTIBODY-DRUG CONJUGATES
* ADVANCED PROTEOME THERAPEUTICS - IMMUNOBIOCHEM GRANTED RIGHTS TO LICENSE PROPRIETARY SITE-SELECTIVE CONJUGATION TECHNOLOGY
* ADVANCED PROTEOME THERAPEUTICS CORP - PRE-NEGOTIATED LICENSING TERMS INCLUDE UPFRONT AND MILESTONE PAYMENTS AND ROYALTIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
